cast.name: 保罗·吉尔福伊尔 Paul Guilfoyle
亚历山德拉·坦普勒 Alexandra Templer

introduction: Steve Baker (TAYLOR GRAY) is a night watchman in his early 20's but his life is already getting away from him. His band is falling apart, he owes a ton of money for drugs, and he's in love with his best friend's girl. When Marty (PAUL GUILFOYLE) comes along and ropes Steve into a criminal world of oddballs, misfits, and lost souls that are as dirty as the Charles River, Steve wonders if this is a change for the better or if he's about to make the worst decision of his life.
